properties.name: Holiday Inn North
properties.description: Posted by Chance1376  1950 Newtown Pike, Lexington, KY, 40511The HIN as it is known by is the hub activity after the activites at the horse park die down. Breyer holds their Artisian Gallery and Swap meet in conference rooms at the HIN. You can also go room to room looking for deals to feed your model horse habit.
